backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing registrant, profile, and badge storage with authorization checks for queries and updates.
feature_evidence.json: Feature-evidence report mapping features to source files, components, and test IDs with confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing purpose and behavior of all major frontend files.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Guide outlining mainnet deployment steps, canister ID verification, mismatch handling, and recommended environment variables.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables defining warm color palette and dark mode overrides.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file mounting the React app and loading the main TypeScript entrypoint.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and wraps the app with layout, profile modal, and theme provider.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Global layout with navigation, user badge, auth controls, mobile menu, and deployment mismatch warnings.
frontend/src/components/AuthControls.tsx: Provides a sign-in/sign-out button using Internet Identity, handling login state, errors, and cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/DeploymentInfo.t: Shows deployment configuration details in a popover with copyable fields, mismatch alerts, and diagnostics.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Displays a modal prompting new authenticated users to submit a display name and saves it via mutation.
frontend/src/components/world/PlanetWorl: Renders a rotating planet with animated inhabitants using react-three-fiber, updating positions and new entity animations.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current identity, invalidating dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Retrieves the authenticated user's profile, role, and admin status using actor-backed queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, providing login, logout, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines mutations and queries for user profiles and registrants, automatically invalidating caches on updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserBadge.ts: Fetches or creates the current user's badge using the authenticated backend actor with caching.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive CSS variables for light and dark themes, applying global background, text, and border styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, setting up React Query and the Internet Identity provider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/DirectoryPage.tsx: Provides a searchable, filterable directory of registrants with admin deletion support and loading/error states.
frontend/src/pages/EventsPage.tsx: Displays a coming-soon events page with completed step info and previews of upcoming community features.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Renders the marketing landing page with hero content, calls to action, and feature highlights.
frontend/src/pages/RegistrationPage.tsx: Implements user registration and profile editing with validation, interest selection, and badge loading.
frontend/src/pages/WorldPage.tsx: Shows a digital world visualization tied to registrant count with authentication gates and community stats.
frontend/src/utils/deploymentInfo.ts: Reads deployment env vars and infers network and canister IDs from the hostname, including mismatch detection for IC mainnet.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read, persist, and clear URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/src/utils/worldPlacement.ts: Generates deterministic 3D positions and colors for inhabitants using goldenâ€‘angle distribution and seeded math.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending typography, color tokens, container settings, animations, and plugin support.
project_state.json: Project status file describing app goals, architecture notes, known issues, and implemented features metadata.
